value:
$WmMPID_スルト,ch00_07_Surtr_M_Normal,Face|Laevatein...$k$p"Do not rest until you have killed
them." I made myself clear.$k$p$WmMPID_レーヴァテイン,ch00_09_Laevatain_F_Normal,Face|Yes. And we—$k$p$EFace_Pain|Aagh!$k$p$WmMPID_スルト,ch00_07_Surtr_M_Normal,Face_Anger|They still live.$k$p$WmMPID_レーヴァテイン,ch00_09_Laevatain_F_Normal,Face_Pain|Guh—gaah!$k$p$WmMPID_スルト,ch00_07_Surtr_M_Normal,Face|Here you sit, soaked in shame. You
are a disgrace to Múspell.$k$p$EFace_Anger|For the weak, there is only death!$k$p$WmMPID_レーヴァテイン,ch00_09_Laevatain_F_Normal,Face_Pain|Father...I am...sor—aaagh!$k$p$WmMPID_レーギャルン,ch00_11_Laegjarn_F_Normal,Face_Pain|Father—please! Stop! If you keep
going, she'll... She'll...$k$p$WmMPID_スルト,ch00_07_Surtr_M_Normal,Face|She'll what? She'll die? What concern
of it is yours?$k$p$WmMPID_レーギャルン,ch00_11_Laegjarn_F_Normal,Face_Pain|Father...$k$p$WmMPID_スルト,ch00_07_Surtr_M_Normal,Face|Laevatein. I will grant you one last
chance.$k$pOffer yourself to the flames of
Múspell.$k$p$EFace_Smile|No matter how poor the fuel...the
flame will not suffer for it.$k$p$WmMPID_レーギャルン,ch00_11_Laegjarn_F_Normal,Face_Pain|The flames of Múspell? You know
what that means!$k$p$WmMPID_スルト,ch00_07_Surtr_M_Normal,Face|A fitting death.$k$p$WmMPID_レーギャルン,ch00_11_Laegjarn_F_Normal,Face_Pain|Please... Father...$k$p$EFace_Anger|Send me instead. If you'll allow it, I
will take her place...$k$pI will be the one to burn with the
flames of Múspell—I will be the one
to destroy our enemies! I beg you...$k$p$WmMPID_スルト,ch00_07_Surtr_M_Normal,Face|So be it. You shall be the one to die.
And if you fail, your sister will be
next.$k$pGo.$k$p$WmMPID_レーギャルン,ch00_11_Laegjarn_F_Normal,Face|Very well, Father.$k$p

$WmMPID_アンナ,ch00_03_Anna_F_Normal,Face_Pain|This secret entrance is very cleverly
hidden. If Loki hadn't given us this
map, we never would have found it.$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Anger|And imprisoned in this temple is
Princess Veronica...$k$pYou!$k$p$WmMPID_レーギャルン,ch00_11_Laegjarn_F_Normal,Face_Anger|Rgh...$k$p$WmMPID_フィヨルム,ch00_06_Fjorm_F_Normal,Face|Princess Laegjarn!$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Pain|Wait a moment, Princess Fjorm...
Something is not right here.$k$p$WmMPID_レーギャルン,ch00_11_Laegjarn_F_Normal,Face_Anger|Múspell, dragon of flame...I offer you
my flesh.$k$pArm and arm, leg and leg. My head,
my heart... All of it offered, that you
may feed. Devour me!$k$p$SspSE_SUMMON_STONE_FLASH|$Sbs3000|$Fo1000,255,0,0,255|$Fi1000|$EFace_Pain|Aah! Aagh... Aah... Hah...$k$p$SspSE_SUMMON_STONE_FLASH|$Fo1000,255,0,0,255|$Fi1000|AAAAAAGH!$k$p$SspSE_SUMMON_STONE_FLASH|$Fo2500,255,0,0,255|$Fi2500|

$WmMPID_レーギャルン,ch00_11_Laegjarn_F_Normal,Face_Pain|Lae...vatein... Somehow... You have
to... Please...$k$p

$WmMPID_フィヨルム,ch00_06_Fjorm_F_Normal,Face_Pain|Laegjarn...$k$p$WmMPID_レーギャルン,ch00_11_Laegjarn_F_Normal,Face|Spare me...your pity. I can...no
longer...be saved.$k$pThose who offer themselves to the
flames of Múspell gain tremendous
power...briefly. Death follows quickly.$k$p$WmMPID_フィヨルム,ch00_06_Fjorm_F_Normal,Face_Pain|Surely...surely we can...$k$p$WmMPID_レーギャルン,ch00_11_Laegjarn_F_Normal,Face|If you want to do something for me...
Please, find Laevatein...$k$pProtect her. Please! She is all I have...$k$p$WmMPID_フィヨルム,ch00_06_Fjorm_F_Normal,Face|I understand. We will make every
effort to rescue her.$k$p$WmMPID_レーギャルン,ch00_11_Laegjarn_F_Normal,Face_Smile|Thank you, Princess Fjorm...$k$p$EFace|My eyes...the flames of Múspell have
burnt them away. I cannot see a
thing...$k$pBut it is only now, I think...that I can
truly see you. Strange, isn't it?$k$p$EFace_Smile|Princess Fjorm... Suppose we had
chosen a different path back in Nifl...$k$pCould we have been... With you,
could we have been...$k$p$WmMPID_フィヨルム,ch00_06_Fjorm_F_Normal,Face_Pain|Laegjarn...$k$p$Sbs150|
